testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

items.name: Emily Davis
items.comment: I can't believe how easily I was able to remove silence from my podcast! It saved me so much editing time.

items.name: Jordan Lee

items.comment: The security of processing everything locally was a huge plus for me. Highly recommend!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about WaveSpeed AI

items.title: What types of audio can be processed?
items.description: WaveSpeed AI can handle various audio types, including podcasts, music tracks, and voice recordings, effectively removing silence or gaps between spoken content.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Users receive 30 free credits daily, allowing ample processing. Additional credits can be earned through tasks or our community engagement.

items.title: Can I use my processed audio for commercial purposes?
items.description: Paid users on any subscription plan can utilize processed audio for commercial projects. Free-tier users can use it for personal use but cannot monetize it.

items.title: How is my privacy maintained?
items.description: All audio processing happens directly in your browser using state-of-the-art technology, ensuring your files are never stored or sent to remote servers.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Audio?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the difference. No registration needed.
